metadata.title: CVE-2020-12658 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** gssproxy (aka gss-proxy) before 0.8.3 does not unlockcond_mutex before pthread exit in gp_worker_main() in gp_workers.c. NOTE:An upstream comment states "We are already on a shutdown path when runningthe code in question, so a DoS there doesn't make any sense, and there hasbeen no additional information provided us (as upstream) to indicate whythis would be a problem."

criterions.comment: gssproxy package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
